metadata.title: CVE-2018-25004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to performing a specific type of query may trigger adenial of service by issuing a generic explain command on a find query.This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to4.0.6; MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.11.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
